Opacity10.description: Very low opacity, used for subtle background effects or soft overlays

Opacity20.description: Low opacity for light shadows or elements that need to blend into the background

Opacity50.description: Balanced opacity for semi-transparent layers or overlays

Opacity60.description: Slightly more opaque, commonly used for semi-visible elements

Opacity70.description: High opacity, for noticeable transparency effects or background overlays

Opacity80.description: Very high opacity, used for elements that need to stand out, but still show some background

Opacity90.description: Nearly full opacity, for almost solid elements with just a hint of transparency
